name: Development
description: I am a web application architect with expertise in modern libraries and frameworks. I create scalable, maintainable websites with a strong focus on performance and user experience.

name: Design
description: I've a decade of experience defining requirements, designing, implementing, testing and delivering complex front-end and back-end applications using variety of programming languages and technologies.

name: SEO & Web Performances
description: The secret for a good positioning is to have a website that is great in every way: Technically perfect,fast and secure, clear in terms of structure. I can help you with that.

name: Contents
description: I love creating content and sharing what I learn every day at work and during my periods of studying new technologies.

name: Maintenance
description: I use maintenance software to schedule, monitor, and streamline upkeep tasks, ensuring the efficient and reliable maintenance of software products.

name: Community
description: I enjoy participating in community events and discussions, contributing my insights to various topics.
